headline: Brokers Suggest Investing in ConocoPhillips (COP): Read This Before Placing a Bet
summary: Based on the average brokerage recommendation (ABR), ConocoPhillips (COP) should be added to one's portfolio. Wall Street analysts' overly optimistic recommendations cast doubt on the effectiveness of this highly sought-after metric. So, is the stock worth buying?

headline: Oil Price Tops $70 Amid Trump, Iran Fears. Where It Goes From Here.
summary: STOCKSTOWATCHTODAY BLOG  International oil benchmarks rose early Friday, after the latest round of nuclear talks between the U.S. and Iran failed to result in a deal.   Brent crude futures rose to $72.

headline: Oil ETFs in Spotlight as US-Iran Nuclear Talks Get Extended
summary: USO and other oil ETFs draw focus as extended US-Iran nuclear talks keep crude volatile, with sanctions and supply risks driving sharp market swings.
